author: AEMiranda (Guest)
title: Help setting up Panama Provider
text:
My provider only gave me user/password and APN, I changed the generic and generic-chat as instructions said and start berry4all using terminal instructions but the berry4all main windows is for all its fields completely empty.
What did I do wrong? I need to modify something else?
Thsnks in advanced.
Abdel

title: Please help...
text:

author: Emily (Guest)
title: Pretty sweet.
text: Works well, obviously isn't as fast as I would like but it's pretty good. Very handy!

author: John (Guest)
title: help
text:
I have everything installed. When i tried to run berry4all using the conf/bellmobility setting, the gui ends with the following lines

PAP authentication succeeded
LCP terminated by peer
Connection Terminated

I still can't connect to the internet.  Why am i getting LCP terminated by peer?

author: Guest (Guest)
title: Modem speeds
text: I am looking at the screen shot on the website that indicates an "average speed" of 122kbps.  I've installed Berry4all and got it working but my "average" speed is 12kbps.  Other than changing the speed in the att/config file to, say, 460800, what else can I do?  E-mail:  w2gnd@yahoo.com

author: Guest (Guest)
title: My 2 cents.
text: Very nice worked with no problem with bb8300 on at&t on ubuntu ultimate edition 2.3. Thanks for your work will make traveling a little less stressful.
